name: HexSurvival
description:
Each player has their own land, which gradually shrinks from the outside over time.

If you destroy the opponent's land, you will have the same number of destroyed land.

If there is land owned by destruction, the owned land will be consumed first.

So the player who survives the longest by destroying the opponent's land wins the game.

To get to the opponent's land, you must go through the central area, which is the direction the player character is facing at the first start of the game.

You can go to each player's land from the central area.

And you can use the 3rd weapon to destroy the opponent's land.

Multiplayer

This game supports multiplayer with up to 6 players.

Quick match can only start with 6 players.

If you create your own room, you only need 2 or more players.

Contols

- Movement (←→↑↓)

- Fire (Z)

- Walk (Ctrl)

- Sprint (Shift)

- Jump (Space)

- Switch weapons (numbers 1-3)

- Tab (Portal movement)

- (If out) Spectator change (number 1 ~ 6 )

There are additional explanations in the game, but please understand that only Korean is supported.
